name: 2/10 Cut that wire!
description:
Disclaimer

A timer will start as soon as the play button is clicked. 

SOME PEOPLE (ME INCLUDED) MIGHT FIND DISTURBING THE QUICK COLOUR SWITCH.

Controls

1. The colour of the bar on top on and on the bottom will be exactly the same of the wire that needs to be cut.

2. Hold left button next to the right wire to cut it.

3. Don't hold the button too long (drawing a longer line). It will be calculated as a mistake.

4. You have 3 seconds of time to cut the right wire, after that a mistake will be calculated and the wires redrawn.

My 2nd Entry for 10 mini-games jam.

Following the Theme suggestion: the cursor will cut like a BLADE and the cursor control is similar  to drawing a software pencil).

a bit buggy (as usual).

Made with p5,js
